name: dispose-of-your-hazardous-waste-on-saturday
title: Dispose Of Your Hazardous Waste On Saturday
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Yes, we’re serious about that. Between 9am-1pm on Saturday, we’re going to be dumping our hazardous household waste at a variety of metro collection points:

  • Hillsboro High School (3812 Hillsboro Pike in Green Hills)
  • Bellevue at the MTA Park & Ride (Coley Davis Road and Highway 70 South)
  • Dupont Hadley Middle School (1901 Old Hickory Blvd. in Old Hickory).

They’re only taking common hazardous waste, with a focus on prescription medicines. You can also drop off batteries, lightbulbs, thermometers and cell phones. No paint or tires- those still have to go to East Convenience Center (943-A Dr. Richard G. Adams Drive).
